learning.unsupervised.outliers

Class LOCI

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.outliers.OutlierDetector
      • learning.unsupervised.outliers.LOCI

  • public class LOCI
extends OutlierDetector
    This class implements the Local Correlation Integral approach to outlier detection and removal, as described in the following paper: 'LOCI: Fast Outlier Detection Using the Local Correlation Integral' by Spiros Papadimitriou, Hiroyuki Kitagawa, Phillip B. Gibbons and Christos Faloutsos that was presented at IEEE 19th International Conference on Data Engineering (ICDE'03) in Bangalore, India.

      • LOCI

        public LOCI(DataSet dataset,
    CombinedMetric cmet,
    int minNeighbors,
    float alpha,
    float ksigma)
        Parameters:
        dataset - Dataset to be analyzed.
        cmet - The metric object.
        minNeighbors - Minimal number of neighbors for a neighborhood.
        alpha - The part of the neighborhood to count.
        ksigma - The number of deviations that define outliers.
